title: Bruno Tonioli: 'I don't really know who any of the Strictly celebrities are'
text:
Bruno Tonioli is becoming agitated. The flamboyant Strictly judge starts waving his arms around, then falls back in his chair in disgust. For once, however, his excitement isn’t over a mangled foxtrot, but over my mention of the “Curse of Strictly” whereby, over the years, numerous celebrities have fallen for their professional dance partners.

“Love happens anywhere when you have a lot of people spending a lot of time together,” Tonioli cries. “Why is that a curse? It’s wonderful!”

Well, maybe not so wonderful if the lovebirds are already in relationships?

“In those cases that first love would have ended up in the pan anyway,” Tonioli retorts.

Tonioli, 63 but looking a decade younger, says he...
